#summary Description about supported types of interactivity
#sidebar TableOfContents

<wiki:toc max_depth="2"/>

= Interactivity Features =

 * RIGHT supports a variety of interactivities.
 * Such as Tooltip Box, Simultaneous selection, Hiding/Reset, Searching, Table, Right-click Menu, and Regression.

== 1. Tooltip Box ==
A mouse hover on a node triggers tooltip box which includes all information about the node.

<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/tooltip.PNG">

== 2. Simultaneous Selection == 
Each data point on different graphs is connected so that they will be selected at the same time.
Multiple selection with Ctrl/Shift key and box selection is also possible.

<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/simul_selection.PNG">

== 3. Hiding/Reset == 
Selected nodes can be hidden. Also, hidden nodes can be reset.

 * Before hiding.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/hide_before.PNG">

 * Select the nodes you want to hide and use _right-click menu_ to hide.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/hide_mid.PNG">

 * After click _hide_ menu, it will hide the selected nodes.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/hide_after.PNG">

 * If you want to restore the nodes, use _right-click menu_ again.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/reset_before.PNG">

 * After click _reset_ menu, it will reset the hidden nodes.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/reset_after.PNG">

== 4. Searching == 
Nodes can be searched and selected with boolean statements using search box.

 * Auto-complete is enabled for users' convenience.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/search01.PNG">

 * Tye boolean statements, and it will select the nodes which satisfy the condition.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/search02.PNG">

 * Recent boolean statements are saved in [ans], so you can re-use [ans] for further search.
<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/search03.PNG">


== 5. Table == 
Table shows all information about selected nodes.

<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/table.PNG">

== 6. Right-click Menu ==
When right click occurs, it will show context menu.

<img src="http://thepotter.woobi.co.kr/img/rightmenu.PNG">

== 7. Regression == 
Draw a regression line(linear or loess) using server offloading in Shiny package.
Check more detail in [RIGHTForShiny this page]
